data.title: Dumbbell Set
data.description: A set of adjustable dumbbells for strength training.
data.details: For early morning bootcamp sessions in the park. Expect a mix of bodyweight exercises, sprints, and team challenges—all while enjoying fresh air and nature.

data.title: Treadmill
data.description: High-quality motorized treadmill for cardio workouts.
data.details: Michel is a certified personal trainer with over 10 years of experience. He focuses on helping clients build functional strength through compound movements and proper form.

data.title: Protein Powder
data.description: Whey protein isolate for muscle recovery.
data.details: Alex is a former dancer turned fitness instructor. Her barre classes combine ballet-inspired moves with strength training for a full-body workout.

data.title: Resistance Bands
data.description: Set of elastic bands for strength and flexibility exercises.
data.details: He Leads invigorating aqua aerobics sessions in the pool. The buoyancy of water reduces impact on joints while providing resistance for a full-body workout.

data.title: Yoga Mat
data.description: Non-slip mat for yoga and stretching routines.
data.details: Emily believes that yoga is not just about physical postures; it’s a journey inward. Her classes focus on breath awareness, alignment, and finding stillness within movement.

data.title: Weight Bench
data.description: Adjustable weight bench for various strength exercises.
data.details: Our energetic dance fitness instructor. Her classes fuse dance styles like hip-hop, salsa, and contemporary with cardio exercises. Get ready to groove and sweat!

data.title: Jump Rope
data.details: Instructor Chris Evans, has worked with professional athletes across various sports. His training programs emphasize functional strength, agility, and injury prevention.

data.title: Kettlebell
data.description: Cast iron kettlebell for functional strength training.
data.details: Former competitive kickboxer. His high-energy classes combine cardio drills with kickboxing techniques, making workouts both challenging and fun.

data.title: Gym Gloves
data.description: Padded gloves for weightlifting and protection.
data.details: An indoor cycling enthusiast. Her classes are all about pushing limits, sweating it out, and enjoying the rhythm of the music.

data.title: Foam Roller
data.description: Self-myofascial release tool for muscle recovery.
data.details: Passionate yoga instructor who believes in the mind-body connection. Her classes emphasize flexibility, balance, and relaxation.
